problem.display_name: Incorrect Disaggregations & Duplication of Variables - Graded Exercise

multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the main issue that has the highest impact on data quality with the above form? (2 attempts)

choicegroup.choice: A. Clinical cases should not be grouped with testing and results.
B. The disaggregations are using a mix of months and years.
C. Pregnant Women is a subset of 15 years+.

div.p: Option C has the largest impact on data quality because totals will be incorrect for each data element. Regarding disaggregations using a mix of months and years, as well as Clinical cases should not be grouped with testing and results, both may be a formatting issue, but is less likely to have a direct impact on data quality.
